issue.title: [Python] csv/orc format strings missing from some dataset docs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14931](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14931). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As noted in ARROW-14781 the "csv" and "orc" formats are not listed in a few spots in the python dataset docs.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14931?focusedCommentId=17452615) by Weston Pace (westonpace):*
